values.description: This page explains how to build, train, deploy and store Scikit-Learn models.
values.keywords: Import the sklearn library, train the sklearn model, support vector regression prediction model, periodically re-train the model, use the label prediction to place orders, save sklearn models into the Object Store, load and trade with pre-trained sklearn models
